title: Premier League 2022-23 Season Highlights
contents:
Every August there is always a excitement among football fans as the
club football returns for the new season with a bang across Europe.Teams
will have to face new challenges ahead of them.
Premier League is one of the toughest competition across top 5
European leagues.From title challenges to local derbies to relegation
battles it is always a hell of a ride for all the teams
Let’s look at some interesting numbers at 2022/23 season via data
from transfer market,football reference etc.
Chelsea FC Signings
From sacking Thomas Tuchel and new takeover of the club ,Chelsea
season has been a complete disaster. They have spent the most in the
transfer market.Let us look at some of their top transfers









Figure 1: Chelsea 2022/23 Transfers



Top signings of Chelsea include the likes of Enzo Fernandez,Fofana
,Mudryk.
Some of their signings experienced an absence of numbers appearing on
the pitch like Aubameyang and Sterling who are experienced in the
Premier league.
Title Race:Man City-Arsenal






Figure 2: Title Race 2022/23 Transfers



Two horse title race between Arsenal and City was the major headline
last season.Arsenal were really in control till game week 29 and then 3
consecutive draws which proved very costly in hunt for the title where
they failed to capitalize 2-0 lead in 2 of the matches and also drew
against Southampton 3-3 at home. Arsenal went on to win only 3 of their
last 6 games
City meanwhile were consistent after game week 24 where they have not
lost a single game until the final match week to BrentFord(only side to
beat city twice in the 2022/23 season).But from the above graph we can
also see that from match week (16-22) city lost 3 games and drew 1 but
were consistent after that till the business end of the tournament which
helped them to win hatt-rick of PL titles.
Erling Haaland in his first season won the golden boot and his
numbers were phenomenal.

title: Sports Analytics
